original_title: Developing Hell: The Making of Hades
overview: This documentary takes you inside developer Supergiant Games for every step of the gameâ€™s journey: from before its surprise announcement, to its full launch almost two years later, and beyond, as the game grew into a worldwide phenomenon. The result is a unique chronicle of one of the most celebrated games of 2020, and an insightful look at how a small team can bring a game to life.
title: Developing Hell: The Making of Hades
